title: Fish stew with couscous
ingredients: ['725ml water', '260g dry couscous', '2 tablespoons olive oil', '1 small onion, chopped', '1 green pepper, chopped', '2 cloves garlic, finely chopped', '130g marinated artichoke hearts, liquid reserved', '2 teaspoons capers, liquid reserved', '12 small green olives', '1 (400g) tin chopped tomatoes, drained', '2 tablespoons white wine (optional)', '1 tablespoon lemon juice', '250ml water', '2 teaspoons sumac', '1 1/2 teaspoons crushed chillies', '1 teaspoon dried basil', '1 teaspoon ground cumin', '1 teaspoon finely chopped fresh root ginger', 'ground black pepper to taste', '450g tilapia fillets, cut into chunks']
